issue.title: [Java] Further cleanup maven output
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4344](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4344). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Followup to ARROW-4180, I noticed a EchoServer logs info output that should be changed to debug. Also, upgrading the rat license check plugin will not output all files excluded, which ends up to be a large amount of output as it is done for every module.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4344?focusedCommentId=16750615) by Bryan Cutler (bryanc):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3466
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3466>
